body_html: I'm not sure we should worry too much about performance of virtual dispatch in this PR, since C10 is intending to redo how the dispatch works (and if virtual dispatch is too expensive, we have a plan for devirtualizing these functions.)
body_text: I'm not sure we should worry too much about performance of virtual dispatch in this PR, since C10 is intending to redo how the dispatch works (and if virtual dispatch is too expensive, we have a plan for devirtualizing these functions.)
body: I'm not sure we should worry too much about performance of virtual dispatch in this PR, since C10 is intending to redo how the dispatch works (and if virtual dispatch is too expensive, we have a plan for devirtualizing these functions.)
